text:
Trending on Billboard

Demi Lovato took to Instagram on Wednesday (June 27) to thank her fans for their support following the release of her deeply personal new single “Sober.”

Lovato has always been extremely open about her struggles with addiction, eating disorders, bipolarity and self-harm, yet “Sober” is possibly the most vulnerable side of Demi that we’ve seen thus far.

Explore Demi Lovato See latest videos, charts and news

“To my fans, my family, and my supporters, the ones who never left me, you are my light. I am forever grateful,” Demi captioned the Instagram video of her performing the song.
title: Demi Lovato Thanks Fans for Support Following Release of ‘Sober’: ‘You Are My Light’
